Text: Local Congesion proposaladdition to the proposal made by Manny wed like to propose the the attached as a further modification to the unit specific dispatch for consideration by the RUG on Dec or This language proposes to base premiums on the Resource plan rather than current output This is consistent with what ERCOT has proposed with OOME and is more appropriate than basing the premiums on unit limits Larry See attached file Local Congestion changes to Sections and doc Local Congestion changes to Sections and doc
PIP BULis the boxed language for BUL This includes the language added last Friday for NOIEs Larry See attached file PIP Balancing Energy Up Loadzip PIP Balancing Energy Up Loadzip
